Outstanding!  You don't let the phone distract you which is the best way to avoid accidents.  For completing 25 trips in a row without phone usage, you've earned a badge.
Nice driving!  50 trips without speeding?  That's unbelievable!  Because you take safety seriously, you've earned a badge.  Congrats!
Hey Grand Marshal!  You are a safe driver.  You've earned a badge for completing 50 trips with a 4 star rating or higher.
Slow and steady wins the race!  For driving 50 trips without a harsh acceleration event, you've earned a badge.
50 trips without a hard braking event?  No way!  You are keeping a safe distance from the car in front of you.  That is one of the best ways to avoid a collision.  Don't stop now!
You are one smart cornerer!  You've earned a badge for getting at least 4 stars for cornering on 50 trips.  Excellent!
Awesome!  You've driven 15 trips at or under the speed limit.  You've earned a badge!
You are a Road Master!  That means you have completed at least 15 trips with a 4 star rating or higher.
Wow! You haven't touched your phone for 10 consecutive trips.  Now, just remember to wait until your car is stopped before bragging to your friends.
Wow! 15 trips with at least a 4 star rating on cornering.  That's some smooth driving.
15 trips without any harsh acceleration events!  That's some excellent driving!
Excellent, you did it!  No hard braking events for 15 trips!  You've earned a badge.
You've been driving the speed limit on your past 5 trips.  Not only are you staying safe behind the wheel, you've earned a badge.  Keep up the good work!
Keep it up!  You have completed 5 drives with a 4 star rating or higher.
You know how to ease into a turn. 5 trips with at least a 4 star rating on cornering. Keep it up!
Relax and take it easy!  Yes, that's how you drive.  Nice even speed and no sudden acceleration for 5 trips.
Congrats, you've earned a badge!  You obviously know that it's better to give yourself plenty of time to stop. You've managed to avoid any hard braking events for 5 trips.  That's great!
Nice job!  It's best to avoid texting and make handsfree calls only.  You've earned a badge for driving 3 trips in a row without touching your phone.
